scripts.docker-build: cd ../../../ && docker build . -f infrastructure/docker/Dockerfile -t stoner/rock-app --build-arg WORKSPACE=@stoner/rock-app
scripts._docker-build-ci-1: cd ../../../ && docker build . -f infrastructure/docker/Dockerfile -t stoner/rock-app --build-arg WORKSPACE=@stoner/rock-app --cache-from=localhost:5000/stoner/rock-app
